about_the_game:
This Modern themed package can be used to create various Female Human characters for everyday life. It's a complementary for the already big Modern #1 pack, and offers a wide variety of colorful clothing and accessories.
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.

Content usable by all Season #2 Female characters:
- 12 skins
- 4 colorable hairs
- 4 hair presets
- 2 hats
- 7 hats with hair
- 24 boots
- 27 pants
- 1 suit
- 48 tops
- 12 underwears
- 3 chest items
- 3 coats
- 4 eyeglasses
- 7 handheld items
- 3 necklaces
- 1 scar
- 11 skirts
- 8 tights
- 2 waist items

Additional content available to all Season #2 Modern themed packs in the General category:
- 7 backgrounds
- 5 companions
- 3 items

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1440 pixels or higher desktop resolution
